__e: When you have your first kid at seventeen with the only man you've ever kissed in your life, and then another kid when you're nineteen, with the same man, and you live in a trailer in your Mom's backyard, and your Dad's been in jail for ten years, you never have time to think.
And I was wondering if that meant that you were a little bit... - Mm... - Gay?
He kissed me and then I said, I don't feel that way about you.
Okay. Okay, so you... do you want me to tell everyone that you didn't kiss me in the cabin or at the club, and none of it happened, none of it's real?
And then, that one night, he kissed me on the beach, and... it was the first time in my life I... I couldn't say no.
He doesn't want me to hang out with the guy who just kissed me in front of him.
And when he kissed me, what I felt for him I'd never felt before for any man.
Although, I mean, you have kissed the guy who made out with your mother, you just, you just didn't know it.
Okay, how are you even gonna know if you kissed the right guy?
I was still stinging from what happened at the wedding and then when you told me about... kissing Emma, I totally mishandled the situation.
You were the first man to kiss my lips.
In fact, I heard that you kissed your girlfriend's sister, so... what would be wrong with kissing me?
I mean, you could stay home... and wonder why James isn't kissing you... or...
I love you,no matter... what you do, who you like, whose boyfriend kisses you.
- [Chuckles] I mean, he did kiss me once, but that's not the same thing, right?
- All right, we kissed once. - But I think I already told you that.
